title: Catalytic combustion of biodiesel wastewater over Fe2O3 catalyst coupled with Pt-based catalyst
content:

In this paper, biodiesel wastewater was treated by catalytic combustion in the case of catalyst coupling. The effects of reaction temperature, residence time and air flow on the treatment of...
